strapiPost.title: Step Right Up For A Halloween Circus At Undercroft Bar
strapiPost.content:
It's time to face your fear of clowns, because Undercroft’s Big Top, a creepy-circus themed popup event is taking over the coolest basement bar in Bentonville from Oct 17-31. 

  • Under what: Undercroft occupies the basement space of The Preacher’s Son in the beautifully-restored church building right off the square. 
  • Cirque de halloween: The classy cocktail bar is getting a Halloween-season makeover, themed after a spooky circus for the last two weeks of October. 

Walk-in’s are welcome, but you can skip the wait and make a reservation HERE.
